text:
Evgeny Igorevitch Kissin ("Yevgeniy Igorevich Kisin"; born in Moscow, 10 October 1971) is a Israeli-Russian-British pianist. He has been an Israel<nowiki/>i citizen since 2013. He is famous for his playing of the works of the Romantic repertoire, such as Frédéric Chopin and Franz Liszt.
References.
3. [https://www.facebook.com/EvgenyKissin.fanpage Evgeny Kissin's fanpage on Facebook]
